short_summary: Implementation of an Electronic Dental Records system for the Atlantic Region
description: Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) has a requirement for the implementation of an Electronic Dental Records system for the collection, management, storage, and sharing of dental patient data and information for the Atlantic Region.",
full_summary:
=================================""><===



### **Electronic Dental Records System for ISC**

#### **Synopsis**

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking proposals for the implementation of an Electronic Dental Records system for the Atlantic Region. This system will be used to collect, manage, store, and share dental patient data and information. The proposed contract duration will be from the contract award date to March 31, 2027, with four (4) option periods.

#### **Key Information**

*   **Contract Reference:** PW-23-01027350
*   **Solicitation Number:** 1000244928/B
*   **Tender Closing Date:** Monday, March 6, 2023 at 13:00

#### **Document Download**

The tender package, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and Terms and Conditions, is available for download from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

#### **Effective Date**

The tender announcement is expired and will only be valid for the purpose of tendering until March 6, 2023.

#### **Contractor Information**

*   **Contractor:** Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)
*   **Address:** 10 Wellington St, Gatineau, QC, K1A0H4
*   **Contact:** Miriam Britel (miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca, 873-355-2463)

#### **Scope of Work**

The proposed Electronic Dental Records system will be used by ISC to manage dental patient data and information for the Atlantic Region. The contractor will be required to:

*   Design, develop, and implement the Electronic Dental Records system
*   Provide training and support to ISC staff
*   Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and standards
*   Deliver the system on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards

#### **Eligibility**
Only those contractors who are registered under the [Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) and have a tax registration number are eligible to bid](https://www.canada.ca/fr/gouvernement/agences/cra.html.

**Important Dates**

*   Tender Closing Date: Monday, March 6, 2023, 13:00
*   Contract Award Date: To be determined

Please note that any bids submitted after the tender closing date will be rejected.

The following files were removed for your review:
*   NPP RFPloquent Electronic Dental Record System 1000244928 B 
*
